main.name: Elvis Gonzalez
main.description: Techie and Foodie by heart, located in historic Charleston, SC. I am passionate about improving, learning, and teaching code!
main.bio: I love learning new things, teaching others, and sealife! üê¢ My main programming experience is in JavaScript, although I have academic experience in other languages, such as Java and Visual Basic. I am currently working with Atlas Technologies, Inc as a Software Tester. Working for Atlas has given me a flexible opportunity that has allowed me to get hands-on experience in designing, developing, maintaining, and integrating web applications with responsive, accessible, and pixel-perfect user interfaces. I am also enrolled in Lambda School, under their Full Stack Web Development track, in order to fill gaps in my knowledge and stay on top of new and developing technologies!
main.prointerests: JavaScript, React, Node.JS, Express.JS, MongoDB, Python, Ruby, TDD, A11Y, Gatsby
main.contactmessage: Thanks for checking out my resume!

work.title: Software Tester
description: Successfully deployed, integrated, and extended various web applications using Apache, PHP, Node, SQL, LDAP, Python, Bash, and JavaScript.
Deployed new systems and networking devices that are compliant to DISA STIG using Ansible.
Implemented a SSO solution across multiple web applications using LDAP and PHP.
Designed various scripts to generate messages within Naval Messaging formatting constraints.
Deployed and Managed an internal Wiki to increase testing speed and provide specialized information.

work.title: Office Manager
description: Deployed and maintained an SQL database for a small business that tracked invoices, resources, and products.
Developed and launched daily standup procedure and weekly meetings.

description: Learned how to be part of a team
